about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate software developer and data analyst with a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen. With over 5 years of experience in software development and more than 10 years in business and finance, I bring a comprehensive understanding of both technical implementation and business requirements to every project.
about.experience: My journey began in the finance sector, where I developed strong analytical skills and attention to detail. This foundation has proven invaluable in my transition to software development, allowing me to create solutions that not only work technically but also address real business needs.
about.expertise: I specialize in full-stack web development using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and Python. My experience spans from building responsive web applications to implementing complex data pipelines and automation systems. I'm particularly skilled in creating user-friendly interfaces while ensuring robust backend functionality.
about.passion: What drives me is the opportunity to solve complex problems through code and help businesses optimize their processes through technology. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and take on challenging projects that push the boundaries of what's possible.
